title: A timeline of Jenna Dewan and Steve Kazee's relationship
text:
From Cosmopolitan

Remember when our hearts turned cold and we realised love was dead? It happened on 3rd April when Jenna Dewan and Channing Tatum announced they were ending their marriage after nine years.

However, it wasn't meant to be. They called it quits, proclaiming they are still "best friends" and will always be "loving, dedicated parents to Everly", their five-year-old daughter.

Since then, they both appear to be happy too. Channing is dating Jessie J and Jenna has moved on with the actor Steve Kazee.

So here's everything we know about their relationship so far - starting from the latest update:

24th September 2019: Jenna and Steve announce their expecting their first child together!

The couple made a statement to People magazine that said: “We are beyond overjoyed and couldn’t be happier to be expanding our family!”

This will be the first child for Steve and the second for Jenna, who has 6-year-old daughter Everly with ex Channing.

Here's the rest of Jenna and Steve's relationship timeline:

3rd April 2018: Jenna and Channing announce their separation, this is what they post on social media:

28th May 2018: Jenna gives an interview to Harper'sBazaar.com where she talks about being single and adapting to the changes in her life:

"The moves I'm making are completely not related to my marriage or separation, interestingly enough. I was always very happy being a wife," Dewan says, but bigger questions were looming, like "'Who are you? What do you want to give to the world? What excites you?' Those feelings started bubbling up for me, naturally… so I really wanted to expand my life, and myself. And that was my journey, no one else's.

"I feel a sense of joy and freedom and excitement, truly, about a new chapter in my life. And I have no attachments to how that's going to look, or what that's going to be. I feel really open, and I feel hopeful."



27th September 2018: Sources report that both the Magic Mike actor and Jenna are seeing other people.

"Jenna has been on a few dates but doesn't talk about a boyfriend," the source tells People magazine. While another source says Channing has also been on a few dates and is having fun but it's nothing "serious".

18th October 2018: A week after the first reports about a relationship between Channing and Jessie J emerge, Us Weekly claims that Jenna is totally fine with her ex moving on because she too is "seeing someone new".



But who is this person? The world wonders...





27th October 2018: Jenna officially files for divorce from Channing citing Irreconcilable Differences and asking for joint legal and physical custody of their daughter. The whole thing seems pretty amicable and, according to documents obtained by the media, Jenna also asks to be now known as Jenna Dewan rather than Jenna Dewan Tatum.

30th October 2018: A day before Channing and Jenna are pictured trick or treating with their daughter and getting along just fine, the identity of Jenna's new boyfriend is rumoured to be Steve Kazee - a broadway actor who won a prestigious Tony award in 2012 for his leading actor role in the musical Once.

Photo credit: Jason Kempin - Getty Images More

People quotes a source who says the pair have been "dating for a couple of months and she's really happy" which is cute!

The couple also appear in an Instagram photo on Jenna's friend's account from a group theme park outing.
description: From Jenna's divorce from Channing Tatum, to Jenna and Steve's pregnancy announcement
